title: Wally K. Daly - The B Block Trilogy - Comedy - MP3 - Slimoo
description:
Wally K. Daly - The B Block Trilogy - Audio Comedy - BBC Radio 7 
3 x 90 Minute Episodes - 128Kbps - Mp3 - Slimoo


Burglar's Bargains is a radio play by Wally K. Daly, the first in the comedic B Block Trilogy about a gang of thieves. It was first broadcast on BBC Radio on 15 December 1979, as an installment of Saturday Night Theatre. The running time is 90 minutes

======================= 


A Right Royal Rip-Off is a radio play by Wally K. Daly, the second in his comedic B Block Trilogy. It was first broadcast on BBC Radio on 03 April 1982 as an installment of Saturday Night Theatre. The running time is 90 minutes.
 <a href="
http://audiodrama.wikia.com/wiki/A_Right_Royal_Rip-Off" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://audiodrama.wikia.com/wiki/A_Right_Royal_Rip-Off</a>


 
======================= 



The Bigger They Are is a radio play by Wally K. Daly, the third in his comedic B Block Trilogy. It was first broadcast on BBC Radio on 03 August 1985 as an installment of Saturday Night Theatre. The running time is 90 minutes

  <a href="
http://audiodrama.wikia.com/wiki/The_Bigger_They_Are" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://audiodrama.wikia.com/wiki/The_Bigger_They_Are</a>
